resources.string: Minoriko is a viewer for danbooru.donmai.us and konachan.com. It\'s designed mostly for viewing pooled doujin in danbooru.donmai.us. Most notable features include viewing of translation notes and comments, browse by tags, and saving searches as favorites.
Either this is a bug, or Danbooru changed their API. Please report this error so that I can fix it :)
Image too big. Due to memory constrain, sample is used. Download the image to SD card for full resolution
